protocols.title: Anchor Cancel™
steps: Place both feet flat on the floor.
Exhale slowly until the chest softens.
Name one neutral object in the room.
Press your toes gently into the ground for 10 seconds.
Let the breath return to normal without control.
protocols.safetyNote: If distress escalates, pause and ground physically or seek support.

protocols.title: Signal Break™
steps: Notice the repeating thought without correcting it.
Label it silently as 'signal noise'.
Shift your eyes to the far edge of the room.
Exhale as if clearing static from a channel.
Stop the exercise the moment the loop weakens.

protocols.title: Micro Repair™
steps: Locate where shame tightens the body.
Apply gentle pressure with one fingertip.
Replace one harsh word with a neutral one.
Straighten one small object nearby.
End with a slow blink.

protocols.title: Frequency Reset™
steps: Stand still and listen for a steady background sound.
Match your breathing to that rhythm.
Ignore thoughts that interrupt the pace.
Exhale longer than you inhale.
Hold a brief pause before the next inhale.
